statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_history;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE wallet_account_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT wallet_account_id, transaction_date FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_type FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_type='deposit' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_type FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_type='withdrawal';
SELECT wallet_account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_history GROUP BY wallet_account_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM wallet_accounts;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM wallet_accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT account_id, transaction_type, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT account_name, balance FROM wallet_accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT account_id, transaction_type, amount, DATE_FORMAT(transaction_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM transaction_history;
SELECT * FROM wallet_accounts WHERE account_id = 1;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM wallet_accounts ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_history GROUP BY account_id;
SELECT account_id, transaction_type, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM wallet_accounts ORDER BY account_name DESC;
SELECT account_name, balance FROM wallet_accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit';
SELECT account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY account_id;
SELECT transaction_date, description FROM transaction_details ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_id, account_name FROM wallet_accounts;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT t.account_id, t.amount, td.description FROM transactions t JOIN transaction_details td ON t.transaction_id = td.transaction_id WHERE t.transaction_type = 'deposit';
SELECT account_id, SUM(balance) AS total_balance FROM wallet_accounts GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_balance > 5000;
SELECT account_id, account_name, balance FROM wallet_accounts WHERE account_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM wallet_accounts;
SELECT account_id, account_name FROM wallet_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT account_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY account_id;
SELECT account_id, account_name, account_balance FROM wallet_accounts ORDER BY account_balance DESC;
SELECT account_id, transaction_id, transaction_date FROM transaction_history WHERE account_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM wallet_accounts;
SELECT account_id, account_name FROM wallet_accounts WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_amount, td.description FROM transactions t JOIN transaction_details td ON t.transaction_id = td.transaction_id;
SELECT th.history_id, th.account_id, t.transaction_amount, th.transaction_date, th.action FROM transaction_history th JOIN transactions t ON th.transaction_id = t.transaction_id;
SELECT account_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_transaction_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_transaction_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM wallet_accounts;
SELECT account_id, account_name FROM wallet_accounts ORDER BY account_id DESC;
SELECT account_name, account_id FROM wallet_accounts WHERE account_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT note_text FROM transaction_notes WHERE note_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM wallet_accounts;
SELECT account_id, account_name FROM wallet_accounts ORDER BY account_id DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, account_id, transaction_amount FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;

SELECT th.transaction_id, td.detail_description, tn.note_text FROM transaction_history th LEFT JOIN transaction_details td ON th.transaction_id = td.transaction_id LEFT JOIN transaction_notes tn ON th.transaction_id = tn.transaction_id WHERE th.transaction_amount < 500;
SELECT wa.account_name, ab.current_balance FROM wallet_accounts wa JOIN account_balances ab ON wa.account_id = ab.account_id;
